title: dnc-webtest
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
As a proof-of-concept, I’m going to test a few different capabilities of the Quarto website. The main things I’m looking for:

Ability to nicely organize pages
Ability to show static R visualizations
Ability to have interactive R visualizations
Ability to have interactive leaflet maps
Ability to embed visualizations or dashboards from other ecosystems (e.g. PowerBI, Tableau)
Ability to achieve semi-complex layouts, with possibly native dashboard elements (perhaps using Shiny?)


Static R Visualizations
